rendering.notconfiguredmessage: Disqus comments are disabled or not configured properly.
rendering.configurationlinkmessage: Please go to the Disqus settings to complete the configuration.
rendering.severalthreadsonpage: Unable to render the Disqus comments thread. Probably there are several comments threads placed on this page.
rendering.previewmessage: This is a preview. Actual comments appear on the published pages in view mode.
